{{also|金步摇}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=金步摇|type=12}}

===Etymology===
[[金]] ([[gold]]) + [[步]] ([[step]]) + [[搖]] (to [[sway]] back and forth)
: this type of headpiece had dangling gold and pearl pieces which would sway back and forth as one walked.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=jīnbùyáo
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} a type of head ornament that was inserted just beneath a hair bun, it had gold and pearls which dangled from it as one walked

#*: [[雲鬢]][[花顏]]'''金步搖'''
